headline: Bees: Of Pollination And, Yes, Regurgitation
abstract: Regurgitation is an important consideration when it comes to the process of pollination.
lead_paragraph: The bumblebee is a discerning nectar shopper. When choosing which flowers to gather the sticky substance from, it might consider a plantâ€™s distance, the shape of the petals and how sugar-rich the nectar is.
keywords: Journal of the Royal Society Interface
